document.full_text: microsoft corp filed lawsuits for patent infringement on monday against bookseller barnes & noble inc over its nook electronic book reader, widening the software company's legal assault on devices running on google inc's android system.
document.title: microsoft sues barnes & noble over nook reader
lines_and_colors: microsoft corp filed lawsuits for patent infringement on monday against bookseller barnes & noble inc over its nook electronic book reader, widening the software company's legal assault on devices running on google inc's android system.
